mapper.update: UPDATE WORK_MANAGEMENT SET WORK_OUT_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_NO = #{mem_no} and to_char( WORK_DATE, 'yyyymmdd' ) = to_char( sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')
mapper.select: select round(avg(24*(WORK_OUT_TIME-WORK_IN_TIME)),2)work_time_avg,round(sum(24*(WORK_OUT_TIME-WORK_IN_TIME)),1)work_time_sum, count(WORK_DATE) Work_Day_Cnt, greatest((round((24*(sum(WORK_OUT_TIME-WORK_IN_TIME))-(9*(count(WORK_DATE)))),1)),0) overtime from WORK_MANAGEMENT where mem_no =#{mem_no} and (TO_CHAR(WORK_DATE, 'yyyymmdd') BETWEEN (TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate,'d'),'yyyymmdd')) and (TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate,'d')+6,'yyyymmdd')))
select count(WORK_IN_TIME) from WORK_MANAGEMENT where to_char( WORK_DATE, 'yyyymmdd' ) = to_char( sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') and MEM_NO = #{mem_no}

SELECT trunc(mod(24*(SYSDATE-WORK_IN_TIME),24)) worktime_hh,trunc(mod(1440*(SYSDATE-WORK_IN_TIME),60)) worktime_mi,mod(86400*(SYSDATE-WORK_IN_TIME),60) worktime_ss, SYSDATE FROM WORK_MANAGEMENT WHERE MEM_NO = #{mem_no} AND TO_CHAR(WORK_DATE,'yyyymmdd')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd')

SELECT MEM_NO,WORK_IN_TIME,WORK_OUT_TIME, TO_CHAR(WORK_DATE,'yyyy')years_, TO_CHAR(WORK_DATE,'mm')months_, TO_CHAR(WORK_DATE,'dd')days_, TO_CHAR(WORK_DATE,'d')day_nos_, trunc(mod(24*(WORK_OUT_TIME-WORK_IN_TIME),24)) worktime_hh, trunc(mod(1440*(WORK_OUT_TIME-WORK_IN_TIME),60)) worktime_mi, mod(86400*(WORK_OUT_TIME-WORK_IN_TIME),60) worktime_ss, 86400*(WORK_OUT_TIME-WORK_IN_TIME) worktime_full, trunc((to_char(work_out_time,'HH24Miss')-180000)/10000) daily_overtime_hh, mod(trunc((to_char(work_out_time,'HH24Miss')-180000)/100),100) daily_overtime_mi, mod(trunc((to_char(work_out_time,'HH24Miss')-180000)/1),100) daily_overtime_ss , (to_char(work_out_time,'HH24Miss')-180000)daily_overtime_full FROM WORK_MANAGEMENT WHERE MEM_NO = #{mem_no} AND TO_CHAR(WORK_DATE,'yyyymmdd') = #{targetDateString}
